abstract: Microsoft is overhauling its MSN portal to simplify navigation, add more video and make it easier for users to check their social networks without leaving the page.
snippet: Microsoft is overhauling its MSN portal to simplify navigation, add more video and make it easier for users to check their social networks without leaving the page.
lead_paragraph: Three months after Yahoo revamped its home page, Microsoft will begin doing the same on Wednesday with the MSN portal.
